name: Boo! Dice
description:
Made in just under 6 hours for GMC Jam 35 where the theme is "Supernatural".

Beat 10 opponents in a part-skill, part-luck, dice-based challenge!

The aim of the game is to get the highest score from three rolls of the dice. On the 2nd and 3rd roll you can choose which dice you want to reroll, and which you want to keep.

Watch out! Roll any ghosts and your score will be zero, unless you can get a spooky flush of all 6 ghosts, that is.
